title: Update PT 3: Should He Propose Again After She Already Shot Him Down The First Time
description:
Raymond played the first two segments for his girlfriend, Lori. Raymond mentioned that Bert said he’d love to know her take on this whole thing. Raymond told Lori to email us…AND SHE DID.
